driver.create.title: Create Driver
driver.create.passwordGenerated: Driver account created successfully! Please copy the password below and share it with the driver.
driver.create.passwordNote: Note: This password will only be shown once. The driver can change it after logging in.
driver.status.description.available: Driver is available and can accept trips
driver.status.description.ontrip: Driver is currently on a trip
driver.status.description.offline: Driver is offline and cannot accept trips
driver.status.description.suspended: Driver is suspended and cannot accept trips
driver.status.description.blocked: Driver is blocked and cannot login or accept trips
driver.status.changeMessage: Are you sure you want to change the driver status from {{currentStatus}} to {{newStatus}}?
driver.status.warning.blocked: Blocking this driver will prevent them from accessing their account and accepting trips.
driver.status.warning.suspended: Suspending this driver will prevent them from accepting trips.
driver.details.title: Driver Details
driver.delete.title: Delete Driver
driver.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete driver "{{driverName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
driver.delete.warning: The driver will be soft deleted and will no longer appear in the driver list. They will not be able to login or accept trips.
driver.bulkDelete.title: Delete Drivers
driver.bulkDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} driver(s)? This action cannot be undone.
driver.bulkDelete.warning: The selected drivers will be soft deleted and will no longer appear in the driver list. They will not be able to login or accept trips.
driver.bulkStatus.title: Change Driver Status
driver.bulkStatus.message: Are you sure you want to change the status of {{count}} driver(s) to "{{status}}"?
driver.list.noDriversToDisplay: No drivers to display at the moment.
common.unsavedChangesWarning: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

home.testimonials.1.name: Sarah Johnson
home.testimonials.1.text: Excellent service! The bus was clean, comfortable, and the driver was professional. Highly recommend!
home.testimonials.2.name: Michael Chen
home.testimonials.2.text: Great experience from booking to arrival. The staff was helpful and the journey was smooth.
home.testimonials.3.name: Emily Rodriguez
home.testimonials.3.text: Best bus service I've used. Punctual, safe, and affordable. Will definitely use again!

about.hero.title: About GrandLine
about.hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in transportation for over 15 years
about.story.title: Our Story
about.story.paragraph1: GrandLine was founded with a simple mission: to provide safe, reliable, and affordable bus transportation services to everyone. What started as a small local operation has grown into one of the region's most trusted transportation companies.
about.story.paragraph2: Over the years, we've expanded our fleet, improved our services, and built lasting relationships with thousands of satisfied customers. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction has been the driving force behind our success.
about.story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to innovate and improve, always striving to provide the best possible experience for our passengers while maintaining our core values of safety, reliability, and affordability.
about.values.title: Our Values
about.values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.values.mission.title: Our Mission
about.values.mission.description: To provide safe, reliable, and affordable transportation services that connect people and communities.
about.values.vision.title: Our Vision
about.values.vision.description: To become the leading transportation company known for excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction.
about.values.values.title: Our Values
about.values.values.description: Safety, reliability, customer focus, and continuous improvement are at the heart of everything we do.
about.values.commitment.title: Our Commitment
about.values.commitment.description: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards in safety, service quality, and customer satisfaction.
about.timeline.title: Our Journey
about.timeline.subtitle: Key milestones in our company's history
about.timeline.1.event: GrandLine was founded with a vision to revolutionize bus transportation
about.timeline.2.event: Expanded fleet to 200+ buses and launched online booking platform
about.timeline.3.event: Reached 50,000+ satisfied customers and expanded to 50+ cities
about.timeline.4.event: Continuing innovation with 500+ buses and advanced technology integration

about.team.subtitle: Meet the dedicated professionals behind GrandLine's success

services.ourServices.title: What We Offer
services.ourServices.subtitle: From charter buses to event transportation, we have you covered
services.charter.title: Charter Bus Rental
services.charter.description: Perfect for group travel, corporate events, and organized trips. Our charter buses offer comfort, reliability, and flexibility.
services.charter.features.3: Multiple bus sizes to choose from
services.shuttle.title: Shuttle Services
services.shuttle.description: Regular shuttle services for airports, campuses, and corporate facilities. Reliable and punctual transportation.
services.events.title: Event Transportation
services.events.description: Make your event memorable with our professional event transportation services. We handle everything from planning to execution.
services.tours.title: Tour Services
services.tours.description: Explore new destinations with our guided tour services. Comfortable buses and experienced guides for an unforgettable experience.
services.benefits.title: Why Choose Our Services
services.benefits.subtitle: Benefits that make us the preferred choice
services.benefits.safety.title: Safety First
services.benefits.safety.description: All our vehicles undergo regular safety inspections and our drivers are certified professionals.
services.benefits.reliability.title: Reliable Service
services.benefits.reliability.descriptio: We pride ourselves on punctuality and reliability. Your schedule is our priority.
services.benefits.comfort.title: Comfortable Travel
services.benefits.comfort.description: Modern amenities, spacious seating, and climate control ensure a comfortable journey.
